cards.special_text:
[+2]: Create a black Saga enchantment token with “r{3}—You draw a card and you lose 1 life.”
[-2]: You may sacrifice a creature or enchantment. If you do, destroy target nonland permanent.
[-3]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a creature or enchantment you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.”
